2_1H8x2Aeu28Lnj6vhXFNZ32kpvGS6dnqWGA.body: This forum is really just a "proof of concept" and is not really supposed to be a Reddit alternative. If you want a place for general discussion, the best thing to do is create your own board by cloning this site.
